name: Build&Manage
description:
A five minute game where you try to get the highest amount of gold possible by building collectors on resource blocks and then exchanging the collected resources for gold. An AI will try to prevent you from achieving the highest score. The AI has 3 strategies. 

If you find any errors let me know. 

Game developed for my Masters dissertation. If you could complete the 2 min survey at: https://qfreeaccountssjc1.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_d5R3FKyPK9mRLHT I would be very grateful.
